description:
Savvy buyers are sure to be impressed by this solid three-bedroom family home right in the heart of popular Spearwood.

With its multiple living areas, dual outdoor entertaining zones, light and bright bedrooms, fresh carpet and large central kitchen, this ticks all the boxes.

Flanked by two reserves, there's no shortage of greenery within walking distance, with Stargate Shopping Centre and the Coogee coast just a short drive - what a location!

A large street frontage with mature trees and ample parking only adds to the sense of space. Enjoy the front undercover entertaining area, perfect for sitting in the shade with your favourite book.

Inside you're greeted by a large living area with central woodfire perfect for those cosy winter nights.

Other highlights include;
- Open plan kitchen/dining area with breakfast bar, pantry and skylight for to maximise natural light
- New carpet throughout
- Sunken rear games room/living area with outdoor access
- Private undercover rear alfresco area perfect for entertaining
- Three generous bedrooms
- Designer light fittings in main living area
- Large main bathroom with separate bath
- Separate laundry space
- Front parking for two vehicles
- Ducted air conditioning and ceiling fans
- Low maintenance gardens with mature shade trees

This is what savvy home buyers look for - solid, quality homes in a great location. It's sure to attract the attention of first home-buyers, young families and investors alike.

Not to mention the warm, homely feel you get the moment you step inside. This is a home that's ready for you to move in and add your finishing touches.

Don't miss your chance to secure a slice of prime Spearwood real estate.


PROPERTY INFORMATION
Council rates: $1,896.00 per annum
Water rates: $1,016.62 per annum
Block size: 380 sqm
Zoning: R30
Build year: 1976

DISCLAIMER:
The particulars of this property listing have been prepared for advertising and marketing purposes only. We have made every effort to ensure the information is reliable and accurate by also providing any supporting documents to all enquires, however, clients must carry out their own independent due diligence to ensure the information provided is correct and meets their expectations.
